content: 4 lps picot chain 3 joined in circle page 4 on hook yo & draw yarn through all lps on round s round s the hook 2 sts decreased single_crochet single_crochet double beg dc3tog chain 2 count as beg double_crochet yo crochet insert hook in next st yo & pull up a lp yo & slip_stitch slip_stitch pull through 2 lps 2 times 3 lps on hook space space yo & draw yarn through all lps on the hook st s stitch es 2 sts decreased triple a group of 3 chain lps worked os 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space 10 picot 8 8 in same space page 4 beg os chain 3 count as beg double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 yo yarn over 2 double_crochet in same space os over shell work os in chain-2 space of os below join join the round with a slip_stitch in top of beg st not a chain christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 4 egap picot chain 3 insert the hook from right to left under the front lp & bottom vertical bar of previous st photo a-1 yo & pull through all lps on the hook picot is completed photo a-2 please check out this >> free video tu- b-1 torial << on our blog for detailed instructions a-1 b-2 a-2 b-3 triple picot chain 8 insert the hook from right to left under the front loop & bottom verti- cal bar of previous single_crochet photo b-1 yo & pull through all lps on the hook chain 10 insert the hook from right to left through the same st yo & pull through all lps on the hook photo b-4 b-2 chain 8 insert the hook from right to left through the same st yo & pull through all lps on the hook photo b-3 triple picot is com- pleted photo b-4 christmas snowfall - 12 snowflakes | irarott® crochet pattern | copyright 2009-2016 © irarott increase | irarott com 5 egap snowflake 1 round 3 chain 1 do not count as a st single_crochet in same st as join picot chain 8 skip next chain-5 space & 6 sts work around next chain-19 lp --> single_crochet picot 6 single_crochet picot 2 times single_crochet picot 2 times 6 single_crochet picot 2 times chain 8 skip next 6 sts & chain-5 space *single_crochet in top of next 19 st picot chain 8 skip next chain-5 space & 6 sts 8 3 work around next chain-19 lp --> single_crochet picot 2 6 single_crochet picot 2 times single_crochet picot 2 times 8 1 6 single_crochet picot 2 times chain 8 skip next 6 sts 7 & chain-5 space ** repeat 4 more times from * to ** join = 6 branches finishing fasten_off & weave in the ends © irarott increase 2016 snowflake 2 14 5 4 to beg chain 7 join to beg chain with a slip_stitch to
